attributes.action: reintroduce extinct species to the uk
attributes.additional_details: This petition is about the re introduction of animals that are extinct in the uk like the wolf, lynx, large blue butterfly etc. the white tailed eagle has been successfully reintroduced into scotland so has the red kite so why stop there species like the wolf and lynx would help keep deer numbers in check which in turn would help wildlife grow more naturally and stop overgrazing, i also belive these animals would help tourism in the areas they are introduced.
